title: ICollisionDetectionManager.GraphicsRedrawEnabled
description: Gets or sets whether to display components in their transformed positions.
returns: True to display components in their transformed positions, false to display components in their last known positions
remarks:
If this property is set to false, the graphics display update is drastically reduced. The client application may force the assembly to be redrawn by calling
IModelDoc2::GraphicsRedraw2
.
Set this property to false for maximum performance.
